Name: Wandering Trails: A Hiking Game
About the game: The goal of Wandering Trails is to give you a brief escape from your daily routine or a stressful day and let you relax and experience the beauty of nature from within your home. There are no goals or rules. No hand-holding or markers on the horizon. You're free to explore this little world in any way you want and play as mush or as little as you want. Features: Beautiful Nature - nearly 20 square kilometres to explore Dynamic Weather - procedural weather Day/Night Cycle - dynamic lighting A Camera - to capture the memorable moments Wild life - a variety of animals you can come across
